name: Possible DLL Hijacking of sentinelagentcore.dll
description: Detects possible DLL hijacking of sentinelagentcore.dll by looking for suspicious image loads, loading this DLL from unexpected locations.
author: Amelia Casley
false_positives: False positives are likely. This rule is more suitable for hunting than for generating detections.
query: FROM logs-* metadata _id, _version, _index | WHERE (dll.path == "*\\\\sentinelagentcore.dll" or file.path == "*\\\\sentinelagentcore.dll") and  not (((dll.path == "c:\\\\program files\\\\SentinelOne\\\\Sentinel Agent **" or dll.path == "c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\SentinelOne\\\\Sentinel Agent **") or (file.path == "c:\\\\program files\\\\SentinelOne\\\\Sentinel Agent **" or file.path == "c:\\\\program files (x86)\\\\SentinelOne\\\\Sentinel Agent **")))
